content.prompt: In Old Manâ€™s Cloth, the artist El Anatsui claims that one possible interpretation of his use of materials such as bottle caps to create meaning is that

choices.label: liquor bottle caps represent the transatlantic trade for slaves and alcohol
old, discarded items such as bottle caps can become renewed through art
the Western world treats Africa as a resource for mining metal ore
Africa should build a sustainable economy through recycling

topic.text: 10.4: Theories and Interpretations of Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
